text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Why don't you help the people in county jails and prisons? They are dying. There is no social distancing. The guards and staff bring it in and give it to the inmates. Then they are literally left to die. They refuse to help any of them. It's disgusting. #COVID19 #COVID19Ohio
